attributes.title: Tuberculosis
attributes.description: Tuberculosis (TB) is a contagious disease caused by infection with Mycobacterium tuberculosis (Mtb) bacteria. It is spread through the air when a person with TB disease of the lungs or throat coughs, speaks or sings, and people nearby breathe in these bacteria and become infected.

attributes.alternativeText: Purple background with orange cylinders (TB particles) scattered and gathered around
attributes.caption: Tuberculosis bacteria (Mycobacterium tuberculosis) visualized as orange particles

query.q: "Tuberculosis" OR "Mycobacterium bovis" OR "Mycobacterium africanum" OR "Mycobacterium canetti" OR "Mycobacterium microti" OR "Phthisis"
